name: get_asn_by_country
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool asn_details.
Tool description: Get details about Autonomous System Numbers (ASN), find ASN of IPs/CIDRs, find ASNs of each country etc
API description: Enter country code (ISO 2 letter code such as US, GB etc) to get all the ASNs associated with that country.

country_code.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., 'US', 'GB') to retrieve all ASNs for.
